nodes.title: Open Source Wiki and Knowledge Base Software
nodes.summary: The Advanced Open Source Enterprise Wiki

product.summary: The Advanced Open Source Enterprise Wiki
A free and open-source wiki software package

overview.overview: XWiki是一个开源的企业级Wiki平台。它允许用户创建和编辑内容，以便团队成员可以协作工作、共享知识和文档。

childMarkdownRemark.html:
XWiki offers robust extensibility and customization options, allowing organizations to tailor and configure it according to their needs.

XWiki's use cases are diverse: collaborative intranet, knowledge base, CMS, competitive intelligence, public debate, collaborative creation of school courses, web site creation
